website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering if you are looking for an affordable and easy way to create soft curls, but it may disappoint you if you want a very curly look.
pros: Has an automatic chamber that produces curls with its 360-degree rotation
Heats up to 450°F on the highest setting
cons: Curling barrel is larger than one inch, which isn't ideal for creating tight, well-defined curls

customer_reviews.title: The automatic curling iron works amazing. Heaps up fast
customer_reviews.text: The automatic curling iron works amazing. Heaps up fast. I have never use this kind of hair curler before, got confused at the beginning, It makes perfect curls. Easy to use and light weight. I won’t worry about burning my fingers. I own several curling irons, none of them have ever curl my hair as well as this one. After practice, it does a great job. Thumbs up for the free hair clips and dust bag. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: leah

customer_reviews.title: Love how easy to create curls with this and they ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got this yesterday. Love how easy to create curls with this and they actually do look good. I deduct one star because it’s a little tricky to make this work for some of my hair that is shorter (due to the layering) and the beeping sounds are actually pretty annoying but yet useful if that makes sense. Overall it’s a keeper. As for my picture, you can see how the curls look. I set the curler at the highest setting and keep each strand at 4 beeps. No other product used beside the curler.
customer_reviews.author: Tjangdra

customer_reviews.title: ... used to compared to the one i have and LOVE! but its not compatible overseas so I needed ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes ALOT of getting used to compared to the one i have and LOVE! but its not compatible overseas so I needed this specifically for that.. It will do but its not my preference.. My curls don't hold near as long as my other one I have from Paul Mitchel.
customer_reviews.author: Texasmo

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about this product.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't able to keep my hair in the curler part; it would just fall out. If it did stay in, it wrapped the hair around the barrel so tightly it couldn't move. I used small strands. Curls appeared, but nothing like my hairdresser, when she used hers on me. She had a different brand. Unfortunately, I bought two; one as a present. If I can't get the hang of using this, I can't give it as a present. Directions were poor.
customer_reviews.author: M Garry

customer_reviews.title: Something went wrong
customer_reviews.text: Once you get the hang of it, it does curl hair nicely. Unfortunately, something was VERY strange about this thing and turned my daughter's blonde hair YELLOW!!! Her hair looked like yellow paint spilled on it. I've never had problems like this with any other curling iron....... sending it back and getting a different brand. No way am I going to use this on her.
customer_reviews.author: JKemper

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't curl as advertised, nor does the curl hold for very long.
customer_reviews.author: PLove

customer_reviews.title: Skip it!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. It heated up and twirled, but wouldn't keep my hair between the barrel and the prongs, just kept winding it on the outside where there is no heat. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Matt W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair Curler
customer_reviews.text: Received the automatic hair curler this week, fast shipping! My daughter and I both love this, makes great curls fast! And was super easy to learn how to use!
customer_reviews.author: Bekaru

customer_reviews.title: Super impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Ok guys I'm a hairstylist and I'm super impressed with this. It was very easy to use. I bought it for personal use because It takes me forever to curl my hair. I just hope the machine lasts me as it was pretty cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Zipper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like how it's easy to curl the hair :)
customer_reviews.author: AshwaQ.G

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe this works, but it does! So easy! Only wish they made a larger barrel size for looser curls.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Stewart

customer_reviews.title: I loved!!!
customer_reviews.text: The effect it leaves on the hair is perfect, very easy and fast in 20 min I am ready for any event. as if he had paid 200 dollars in hairdressing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works great I used it on my girlfriend hair to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Eric G.

customer_reviews.title: “I always like to curl my hair
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my friend and she likes it. Her comments are as below. “I always like to curl my hair. If I perm I my hair, I feel that it hurts my hair. Thus, I choose to curl my hair. This style of hair stick is new to me. It is not the same as the one I have used before. The rolled-up roll is more natural. Yes, I like it!”.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! We love it so much that I think we need two of them!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: BARREL SIZE IS LARGER THAN 1.1"
customer_reviews.text: Barrel size is stated to be 1.1 inches per Item Specification but in reality the Barrel is larger than 1.1" Its more like 3.5 inches in diameter which doesn't work well on shorter thin hair above the shoulder. As a result, curl is poor and doesn't last but does add some body. Good price compared to similar products, lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: jlk

customer_reviews.title: A great product that makes perfect curls however it will require ...
customer_reviews.text: A great product that makes perfect curls however it will require lots of practice to do the back of my hair. Hair needs to be well separated or the OUIASTwill catch other hair and rat it all up. It is a good product all in all and i would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Molly.M

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my daughter. She absolutely loves it. The curls last for a few days!
customer_reviews.author: Veramarie

customer_reviews.title: This curling iron is great, it is heated very fast
customer_reviews.text: This curling iron is great, it is heated very fast, and it is easy to make the desired hairstyle. I can go out with a beautiful hairstyle in less than a moment. I like it very much!
customer_reviews.author: Weeko

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My grandmother loves it. Says it's super simple to use and works great
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This curler actually works! I was a bit hesitant to buy it because it wasn't a brand I recognized. My daughter has straight hair and it's incredibly difficult to curl. This has been the only curling product that creates the curl she is looking for. I find curling wands difficult to maneuver and this is a piece of cake. My only complaint is that you cant really get the curl on the upper portion of the hair. It curls the middle to bottom portion of the hair which is really all my daughter wants anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Bree Summers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. I’m very bad at curling my hair but this product helps me a lot. I like how the curls are created so naturally unlike other automatic curling iron. It’s just perfect and I used to hate curling my hair but now I love doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Mingyan Ng

customer_reviews.title: Not tight curls
customer_reviews.text: The roller doesn’t grab onto the hair well to curl it correctly which is the reason I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Priceless

customer_reviews.title: She loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old daughter loves it and loves being able to curl her hair herself.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: This is kind of cool, but my hair is above my shoulders and short enough it's a little hard to use. On longer hair I bet it is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B
